mapper.sql: id, rolenname, iconcls, description, seq, cdatetime, udatetime
mapper.insert: insert into role (id, rolenname, iconcls, description, seq, cdatetime, udatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rolenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{udatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

mapper.update:
update role
rolenname = #{rolenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iconcls = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cdatetime = #{cdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
udatetime = #{udatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
